Audio

Installation

  1. Install audio stream server:

    # pipewire --version || xbps-install pipewire elogind

  2. Enable elogind-daemon:

    # rm /etc/sv/dbus/down
# ln -s /etc/sv/dbus/ /var/service/
# reboot

Configuration

  1. Start audio when X server starts:
    ~/.xinitrc
    ...
## Start audio.
pipewire 2> /dev/null &
...
